text: Not our finest day Jozi.  From the Wits protests to the bridge collapse. #weneedhelp
This could not have come at a bad time like these for Murray and Roberts. Very sad scenario. Condolences to the families. #BridgeCollapse
Dear #Murray&Roberts, your failure to address to media and families of the victims of the Sandton #BridgeCollapse makes bad! It's your duty!
